$interpreted: Uzziah: ......
Tica: He's awake!
Naya: Since you're awake, I've got some questions I'd like to ask you...
Naya: This guy! He can summon monsters!?
Pang: Careful!
Tica: Comrade Naya, he escaped!
Naya: Where'd he run to?
Tica: *sigh*...you don't have to be so impulsive all the time!
Tica: Comrade Pang, let's go get him!
Naya: Hold it right there!
Uzziah: Just give up already.
Uzziah: The Sect is of no concern to you.
Pang: Sect? What sect?
Naya: I'm a Royal Security Officer for the Kingdom of the Sun. I command you to explain yourself!
Uzziah: ...Well, since you are people of little concern, perhaps...
Tica: Waaahhhh!!! Not fair!
Pang: ...Looks like this won't be resolved peacefully.
Pang: Good sir, and to which God is it that you pray?
Naya: There's no way you summoned all those monsters!?
Uzziah: ......
Uzziah: Give up.
Uzziah: The three of you are not enough to stop what has already been set in motion.
Naya: Don't think you're going anywhere!
Tica: Uhhhh~ Now there are like 10 Tica's and it still feels like we can't win!?
Pang: I'll hold him off. You two, get out of here!
Naya: Look!
Pang: He's gone...?
Pang: ...Could it be that he was merely stalling us and that he was not trying to hurt us?
Naya: No way! Didn't you see what just happened? As soon as he woke up, he didn't say a word and immediately started attacking us!
Naya: He must be hiding something!
Tica: Hey-o! Whatever, honey buns. All I know is that you two kicked butt!
Tica: That's the second time Team Tica escaped danger!
Pang: ...That's true. Safety first.
Naya: Hmph. I suppose we didn't come away empty-handed. I'll head back to report what we've seen. I'll get him next time!
Tica: Comrade Pang, I told you Experiment isn't a monster~~
Pang: Apologies for my misunderstanding.
Pang: And forgive me for almost injuring you.
Naya: Second that.
Naya: I've wronged you two, please forgive me. In order to make up for it...
Pang: What is this...?
Naya: This is an Order to Assist in the Location of Missing Persons, approved by a Royal Security Officer. If you're looking for friends, you'll need help, right?
Naya: If you run into any officers unwilling to help because you're a Beast, just show 'em this. That'll scare the pants off of 'em!
Pang: Thank you. Your humble servant accepts.
Tica: Ooooo~ And me?
Naya: I'll write a letter of thanks to the Academy, asking the respected Headmaster to commend you for your invaluable support to the Kingdom.
Tica: Really!? You mean it?
Naya: Of course.
Tica: Sooo cool! I'll get so many credits for this!
Tica: It's already pretty late.
Tica: I guess I've got to head back to the Academy.
Tica: Although I am not happy about this, I nonetheless must proclaim that temporary Team Tica is officially disbanded!
Naya: I am NOT your teammate!
Naya: But I'm really happy I got to meet you two.
Pang: Good-bye, my dear friends.
Tica: If the gods allow it, we'll meet again, friends!
Pang: (Friend...? I'd better go find Puggi.)
Naya: (Looks like the sun's setting...guess I won't be able to see Angelia off...)
Naya: (*sigh*...I'll have to tell her all about this when she gets back.)
Naya: (We should have a little get together with Sione~)
Yamitsuki: Should we follow him?
Aosta: ......
Aosta: Too late. He's already gone.
Aosta: I've waited 27 years for this. Finally, a chance to meet again...

Model.Text: He's awake!
Since you're awake, I've got some questions I'd like to ask you...
This guy! He can summon monsters!?
Careful!
Comrade Naya, he escaped!
Where'd he run to?
*sigh*...you don't have to be so impulsive all the time!
Comrade Pang, let's go get him!
Hold it right there!
Just give up already.
The Sect is of no concern to you.
Sect? What sect?
I'm a Royal Security Officer for the Kingdom of the Sun. I command you to explain yourself!
...Well, since you are people of little concern, perhaps...
Waaahhhh!!! Not fair!
...Looks like this won't be resolved peacefully.
Good sir, and to which God is it that you pray?
There's no way you summoned all those monsters!?
Give up.
The three of you are not enough to stop what has already been set in motion.
Don't think you're going anywhere!
Uhhhh~ Now there are like 10 Tica's and it still feels like we can't win!?
I'll hold him off. You two, get out of here!
Look!
He's gone...?
...Could it be that he was merely stalling us and that he was not trying to hurt us?
No way! Didn't you see what just happened? As soon as he woke up, he didn't say a word and immediately started attacking us!
He must be hiding something!
Hey-o! Whatever, honey buns. All I know is that you two kicked butt!
That's the second time Team Tica escaped danger!
...That's true. Safety first.
Hmph. I suppose we didn't come away empty-handed. I'll head back to report what we've seen. I'll get him next time!
Comrade Pang, I told you Experiment isn't a monster~~
Apologies for my misunderstanding.
And forgive me for almost injuring you.
Second that.
I've wronged you two, please forgive me. In order to make up for it...
What is this...?
This is an Order to Assist in the Location of Missing Persons, approved by a Royal Security Officer. If you're looking for friends, you'll need help, right?
If you run into any officers unwilling to help because you're a Beast, just show 'em this. That'll scare the pants off of 'em!
Thank you. Your humble servant accepts.
Ooooo~ And me?
I'll write a letter of thanks to the Academy, asking the respected Headmaster to commend you for your invaluable support to the Kingdom.
Really!? You mean it?
Of course.
Sooo cool! I'll get so many credits for this!
It's already pretty late.
I guess I've got to head back to the Academy.
Although I am not happy about this, I nonetheless must proclaim that temporary Team Tica is officially disbanded!
I am NOT your teammate!
But I'm really happy I got to meet you two.
Good-bye, my dear friends.
If the gods allow it, we'll meet again, friends!
(Friend...? I'd better go find Puggi.)
(Looks like the sun's setting...guess I won't be able to see Angelia off...)
(*sigh*...I'll have to tell her all about this when she gets back.)
(We should have a little get together with Sione~)
Should we follow him?
Too late. He's already gone.
I've waited 27 years for this. Finally, a chance to meet again...
